Applied Materials CSR Report 2018 19People and 
Workplace 
Our commitment to innovation begins with 
our commitment to creating an environment in 
which our employees can do their best work. Our 
people succeed because they keep current with 
new technologies and skill sets. We believe in 
attracting, developing and retaining a world-class 
global workforce. We invest in our employees 
by providing quality training and educational 
opportunities; promoting diversity and inclusion; 
and upholding a high standard of ethics and 
respect for human rights.
